title: • 8-ball Xin Zhao
body:
Xin Zhao has very serious skins and since we have a fun Dunkmaster, I thought why not apply the same to team Demacia. Couldn't really think of a sport, all I had in mind was poke poke poke poke...and then pool/snooker popped up.

http://i.imgur.com/Ft42czM.jpg
Lots of photoshop, redrawings here and there. Not sure if the skin name is ok :x

**Skill animations (which are silly):**

**Q** For every hit a ball appears above the enemy's head, last one merges the 2 in 1 and bounces up.
**W** Colorful aura surrounds Xin Zhao.
**E** When Xin dashes to a target he leaves behind a transparent clone in the starting point which bursts into balls.
**R** Dont know!

Suggest yours!
